comments.author: Arnold Schilham, UMCU
comments.creator: generate_config_json.py version 20180912
usage: "OCR_xxx:prefix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx starts with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx:suffix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx ends with this and this should be stripped

params.auto_suffix: add a probename as suffix to all results (True)

params.OCR_DynRange:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_DynRange should be of this type
params.OCR_DynRange:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_DynRange
params.OCR_FrameRate:suffix: text in bounding box of OCR_FrameRate starts with this
params.OCR_FrameRate:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_FrameRate should be of this type
params.OCR_FrameRate:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_FrameRate
params.OCR_Gain:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_Gain should be of this type
params.OCR_Gain:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_Gain
params.OCR_LUT:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_PenResGen should be of this type
params.OCR_LUT:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_PenResGen
params.OCR_MechIndex:prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_MechIndex starts with this
params.OCR_MechIndex:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_MechIndex should be of this type
params.OCR_MechIndex:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_MechIndex
params.OCR_PenResGen:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_PenResGen should be of this type
params.OCR_PenResGen:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_PenResGen
params.OCR_Persistence:prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_Persistence starts with this
params.OCR_Persistence:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_Persistence should be of this type
params.OCR_Persistence:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_Persistence
params.OCR_ResSpd:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_ResSpd should be of this type
params.OCR_ResSpd:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_ResSpd
params.OCR_TissueIndex:prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex starts with this
params.OCR_TissueIndex:type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex should be of this type
params.OCR_TissueIndex:xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex
params.auto_suffix: add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
params.ocr_threshold: threshold on pixel values to remove background gradient (0)

params.auto_suffix: add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
params.cluster_mode: mode of connected components analysis; either all_middle (def) or largest_only
params.fitcircle_frac: use only this central fraction for circle fitting
params.hor_offset: default lines to exclude from left and right when making profiles (10)
params.rev_bbox: restrict reverberation pattern to bounding box xmin;xmax;ymin;ymax in px
params.sen_delta: a peak in sensitivity profile must be at least <fdelta>*(max-noise)
params.sen_filter: running average of this width for sensitivity data
params.signal_thresh: threshold on pixelvalues for reverberation patterns; use>0 for noisy data (0)
params.uni_delta: a dip in normalized reverb pattern must be at least <delta>
params.uni_depth: depth in mm of size of ROI for reverb pattern analysis from top of profile. (5)
params.uni_filter: running average of this width before peak detection
params.uni_range_model: method to determine y-range for uniformity profile. absolute/skip10pct/skip20pct/maxsenslimit (absolute)
params.uni_start: offset in mm to start of ROI for reverb pattern analysis from top of profile. (2)
params.ver_offset: default lines to exclude from top and bottom when making profiles (10)
